title: Pabierowice
data: Pabierowice [pabjɛrɔˈvit͡sɛ] is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Grójec, within Grójec County, Masovian Voivodeship, in east-central Poland.[1] It lies approximately 4 kilometres (2 mi) south-east of Grójec and 42 km (26 mi) south of Warsaw. This Grójec County location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
